code_patterns.pattern: For Homebrew tap updates: Formulas use .tar.gz releases (url + sha256), Casks use .dmg releases (version + sha256). Always download the asset, calculate SHA256, and update both the URL/version AND the hash. The workflows automatically commit and push changes when triggered.

problem_solutions.error: Homebrew formulas/casks not auto-updating when CLIO/SAM publish releases
problem_solutions.solution: The update workflows in homebrew-SAM repo need BOTH workflow_call AND workflow_dispatch triggers. workflow_call allows reusability, but workflow_dispatch is required for remote repositories (CLIO/SAM) to trigger the workflow via GitHub API. Add both triggers with identical input schemas to .github/workflows/update-formula-on-release.yml and update-cask-on-release.yml
